sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Rules.css'; function Rules() { return (

Project Usage Rules



Rules for Using the Miss Representation Project



  1. Respect the Purpose: This project aims to address gender representation issues through AI. Please use it in a manner consistent with promoting gender equality and empowering underrepresented groups.


  2. No Misguidance/misuse: Do not use misguiding prompts to divert the use of Gemini AI or misuse the prompts to justify wrong actions.


  3. Appropriate Content Submission: When using the platform, make sure you submit only YouTube links / article texts that you have copied.


  4. Google Form submissions: Do be respectful and proper in language, if you wish to submit a Google Form review


  5. AI-generated Results: The summaries provided by the AI are based on the content input by users. While the AI analyzes text with accuracy, it is recommended that users validate the results independently.


  6. Privacy and Data Protection: Be mindful of privacy concerns when submitting text or URLs. Do not submit personal, sensitive, or confidential information.


  7. No Malicious Usage: The platform should not be used for spamming, data scraping, or attempting to compromise the functionality of the system in any way.


  8. Encouraging Positive Change: This project is about empowering voices and encouraging awareness of gender-related issues. We encourage constructive feedback and the sharing of ideas that contribute positively to the movement.


  9. Disclaimer: The AI tool is intended to raise awareness and provide insights but may not be perfect. Please understand that results are automated and not always flawless.


If you have any questions or need clarification, feel free to contact through Google Form in "Review This Project" tab.

); } export default Rules;
